code: import"./style.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Theme=function Theme(){var swap=function swap(){var classList=document.body.classList;var ico=document.getElementById("moon");if(classList.contains("dark_mode")){classList.remove("dark_mode");ico.className="fas fa-moon";localStorage.removeItem("dark_mode");}else{classList.add("dark_mode");localStorage.setItem("dark_mode","enabled");ico.className="fas fa-sun";}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"theme_change",onClick:function onClick(){return swap();},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{id:"moon",class:"fas fa-moon"})})});};export default Theme;
